B.title: Short-Answer Questions
B.instructions: Answer any 12 questions from this section

questions.question: Define Protocol and name any three.

Define any two of the following:
* Bridge * Router * Gateway
Which mode of Data transmission is suitable for communication from a computer to a printer?

Write the full forms of the following:
* HTTP * URL * SIMM
Define Ring topology and give its advantages.
Differentiate between Volatile memory and Non-Volatile memory.
Define Impact Printer and Non-Impact Printer.
Define Analog Signal and Digital Signal.
Draw the block diagram of a Digital Computer.
How is Internet useful in the field of education?
Why is an Address Bus called unidirectional?
Why is an operating System necessary for a computer?
What are the components of LAN?
Who are the basic hardware needs for internet?
Name any two Full-duplex devices.
What is Computer crime?
Draw the layer cake of OSI model.
Match the terms of column A with those of column B

C.title: Detailed Answer Questions
C.instructions: Answer any Two questions from this section

parts.question: What is Internet Browser? Describe its various types.
What is a Computer Virus? What preventive measures can be taken to protect our computer from its attacks?
Define the term Bus. Describe the functions of any two Buses.
State Copyright law. Give its advantages.
What is Stack? Explain its operations with examples.
Define System Software and explain its three categories.
Define Synchronous and Asynchronous transmissions with diagrams.
Explain the important features of an Operating System.
Who is meant by Primary and Secondary Storages? Define any three types of secondary storage.
